version_description:
We're always making sure the Kraken mobile app is easy, safe and secure for you to use.

This release contains minor fixes to balances and withdrawals.

We're always making sure the Kraken mobile app is easy, safe and secure for you to use.

This release contains minor fixes.

Thank you for downloading the Kraken mobile app!
We're always making sure it's easy, safe and secure for you to use.

• Quickly view your account information with a single tap.
• Track FLOWH, ETH2 and other assets previously not shown via balances.
• Enjoy a smooth and stable experience thanks to a vast number of fixes and improvements.

We're always making sure the Kraken mobile app is easy, safe and secure for you to use.

This release improves the initial loading time of the app.

We're always making sure the Kraken mobile app is easy, safe and secure for you to use.

This release contains performance improvements.

Thank you for downloading the Kraken mobile app!
We're always making sure it's easy, safe and secure for you to use.

• Significantly boosted the app's speed and load times.
• Added support for 8-digit one-time passwords when signing in.
• Implemented a number of usability fixes and improvements.

Thank you for downloading the Kraken mobile app!
We're always making sure it's easy, safe and secure for you to use.

• Better app stability
• Number of performance improvements
• Various fixes to the buy/sell input

We're always making sure the Kraken mobile app is easy, safe and secure for you to use.

This release fixes an issue where an error screen would remain visible on app start.

Thank you for downloading Kraken! We're always making sure it's quick, easy and secure for you to use.

• Use the app in a degraded state when offline
• Reconnect to Kraken automatically if there was an problem doing so
• Remove all full screen errors
• Correctly show the "No internet connection" message
• Various fixes to the buy/sell input and verification flow

Found a bug? Want to request a new feature that could improve Kraken? Let us know via the "Share feedback" section in-app!

Thank you for downloading Kraken! We're always making sure it's quick, easy and secure for you to use.

• Added support for Australian Dollar deposits
• Improved layout and flow of deposit screens
• New swipe animations
• Various fixes to the verification flow

Want to request a new feature that could improve Kraken? Let us know via the "Request a feature" section in-app!

Thank you for downloading Kraken! We're always making sure it's quick, easy and secure for you to use.

• Quickly deposit cash from your transaction history via a new action panel
• ETH2 balances will now show a value
• Reduce flickering on Android devices
• Various fixes to credit card payments

Want to request a new feature that could improve Kraken? Let us know via the "Request a feature" section in-app!

This releases contains fixes relating to payment methods.

This release fixes a bug where an error would show after a successful card payment.

We're always making sure the Kraken mobile app is easy, safe and secure for you to use.

This release fixes an issue where the app would crash on load.

Cryptocurrency deposits and withdrawals are here!

• Create and manage all of your crypto addresses in-app
• Buy and sell crypto easily with a new interface
• Navigate the app with new shortcuts on the top right corner of some screens

This release contains improvements to payment methods, as well as various fixes to the withdrawal process.
